title: Stargazing

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 4.3 x 4.3 inches or 10.9 x 10.9 cm on 14 count aida

story: The creature, with undulating tendrils of inky black, gazed skyward, all eyes fixed on the twinkling stars. It marveled at the delicate patterns of light, feeling a peaceful harmony with the vast night sky.
